title: How can one download Harry Potter games on their PC? - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A. You can download the two latest games from the Harry Potter series using Steam.  Here are the links for steam:Lego Harry Potter Years 5-7 on Steam (Costs $19.99)Lego Harry Potter Years 1-4 on Steam  (Costs $19.99) Mac versions are available in EA Origin online store.  As for the earlier games, you can order the disk versions from Amazon or any other retailer. They might offer digital versions, too, but I am not sure.
